name: Alex's Dumb Bitch Birthday Adventures!
description:
This is an online game I made for my dear friend Alex! If I sent you this link directly, feel free to Run Game and have fun. Also, I'd recommend you don't play this if you are just a random person browsing itch.io- it's full of inside jokes and some Greek and honestly it would be quite confusing. :D

xxx - Elifiri
